Text:
A list of all the languages covered in the two collections arranged by language family:
 A.Afro-Asiatic
1.Arabic 2.Amharic 3.Hebrew 4.Akkadian 5.Syriac 6.Ge'ez 7.Hausa 8.Oromo 9.Somali 10.Coptic 11.Middle Egyptian
B. Altaic
12.Turkish 13.Azerbaijani 14.Uyghur 15.Kazakh 16.Turkmen 17.Mongolian
C. Uralic
18.Hungarian 19.Finnish 20.Estonian
D. Indo-European
21.Spanish 22.Portuguese 23.French 24.Italian 25.Romanian 26.Catalan 27.Russian 28.Ukrainian 
29.Polish 30.Czech 31.Slovak 32.Serbian 33.Croatian 34.Bulgarian 35.Macedonian 36.Lithuanian
37.Greek 38.German 39.Dutch 40.Afrikaans 41.Yiddish 42.Swedish 43.Danish 44.Icelandic 45.Faroese 46.Irish
47.Scottish Gaelic 48.Welsh 49.Breton 50.Armenian 51.Persian 52.Kurdish 53.Hindi 54.Urdu
55.Bengali 56.Punjabi 57.Gujarati 58.Sinhalese 59.Nepali 60.Sanskrit
E. Austronesian
61.Javanese 62.Malay 63.Indonesian 64.Tagalog 65.Samoan 66.Maori 67.Hawaiian
F. Austroasiatic
68.Vietnamese 69.Khmer
G. Sino-Tibetan
70.Cantonese 71.Tibetan H. Tai 72.Thai 73.Lao
I.Dravidian 74.Tamil J. Caucasian 75.Georgian
K. Niger-Congo
76.Yoruba 77.Fulani 78.Shona 79.Zulu 80.Xhosa 81.Bambara 82.Wolof 83.Swahili
L. Language isolates
84.Basque 85.Korean

God bless you, honestly.

Fine collection of French books.

Request for 2 more French books.

1) "Alter ego" from Hachette publications. I've only completed A1. Text + Audio + supplementaries (ecoute) would be welcome with both hands.

2) 501 French Verbs from Barrons, by Christopher Kendris.

Well, I've just updated the French learning pack, it does have the alter ago series (volumes 1-4) and much more (14.26 GB VS the 2.1 GB pack here), including several books on French verbs (not the Barron's one, though) and now it's the best time to download it, there are plenty of seeders, it's only 3 days old after all.
Ignore the Polish description, it's a private joke, and download folder 00.book list first.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6716160/French_Language_Learning_Pack_%28Updated%29

Merci beaucoup Monsieur.

So many books ! Its the first time am seeing many of these titles.

Am downloading now.

Many thanks for sharing.
